name: Meteor Shower (itch) (JesusRodriguez)
description:
Controls : WASD to MOVE

MOUSE to ROTATE THE SPACESHIP

LEFT CLICK to SHOOT

The theme for the jam was "let there be chaos", so there's a little twist...

Everytime you shoot , an asteroid will spawn .

Each asteroid takes 3 hits to destroy , so each one will spawn 3 more

Good luck and have fun playing =D
